<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Handle &quot;-&quot; as stdout just like llvm::raw&#95;ostream does.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Mode |= <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/fs/#ac56b6ec1078927bdd9b65f7ba8fbda82a5a587f3cbb44292644d2f34d72f40553">fs::all&#95;exe</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If Size is zero, don&#39;t use mmap which will fail with EINVAL.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#ab567e593dcf755d782527311e9b300fa">createInMemoryBuffer</a>(Path, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>, Mode);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/fs/file-status">fs::file&#95;status</a> Stat;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/fs/#a5f126cc7b64d31cd709215b48656d83d">fs::status</a>(Path, Stat);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Usually, we want to create OnDiskBuffer to create a temporary file in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the same directory as the destination file and atomically replaces it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// by rename(2).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// However, if the destination file is a special file, we don&#39;t want to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// use rename (e.g. we don&#39;t want to replace /dev/null with a regular</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// file.) If that&#39;s the case, we create an in-memory buffer, open the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// destination file and write to it on commit().</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Stat.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/fs/basic-file-status/#ab01b92f53a9f931c5859498219da2613">type</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/fs/#a6c50be965db24d7532b6b4e6b0755f5ca1c3e56917e1b64d1874d5d88c085e0c9">fs::file&#95;type::directory&#95;file</a>:</span></CodeLine>
